# Most impactful goals

```{r}
winprob %>% 
  group_by(season, round, tie) %>% 
  mutate(wpdiff = abs(pregameodds - lag(pregameodds))) %>% 
  drop_na(away) %>% 
  arrange(-wpdiff) %>% 
  head(30) %>% 
  select(season, round, tie, made_minute, t1win, away, wpdiff)
```
